identity.name: OhCampus Counselor Platform
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix educational trust with tech efficiency.
Content is King: Data (Fees/Courses) must be legible and scannable.
Zoom in: Focus on key details (Fees, Highlights).
Negative Space: Generous padding to prevent data fatigue.

general: Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Public Sans' for body text.
Implement a 'Light Mode' first approach. The dashboard should feel airy and clean.
Use the 'Tetris' grid layout for the Featured Colleges list in the Counselor View.
For the Admin Fee Management, use a 'Tabs' component to switch between Annual, Semester, and Hostel fees.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle noise textures if needed.
Ensure the 'Featured' badge is prominent on college cards using the Accent color (#FF6B35).
admin_panel: The Admin Panel should have a sidebar navigation.
Use 'Table' components from Shadcn for displaying fee structures.
Forms for adding fees should use 'Dialog' or 'Sheet' components to keep context.
Course-wise fees should be grouped using 'Accordion' or clear section headers.
counselor_view: The Home page should feature a prominent Search/Filter bar (State, City, Category).
College Detail pages should use a 'Sticky' side navigation or 'Tabs' for Highlights/News/Fees.
Fee tables in the Counselor view must be read-only and easy to compare.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic centered layouts, uniform styling).
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
Do NOT apply universal transitions (e.g., 'transition: all').
Do NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp).
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
